name: Creamy Baked Halibut Steaks
ingredients: 4 halibut steaks, about ¾ inch thick ¼ tsp. garlic salt
steps: salt 1 ½ tsp. chopped chives, fresh or frozen
¾ c thick sour cream 1 tsp. paprika
Place steaks, close fitting, in a shallow buttered baking dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Mix together sour
cream, bread crumbs, garlic salt, and chives, and spread over steaks. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and paprika.
Bake, uncovered, at 400 degrees for 15-‐20 minutes, or until fish flakes w/ a fork. Makes 4 large or 8 small servings.
